Improve this resume bullet:
""I am in the process of creating several tracks across a variety of genres including Soul, R&B, Rap, Afrobeats, and Dancehall. I'm seeking male or female singers experienced in creating melodies to collaborate with. Whether you're crafting the melody for the hooks or performing them, your contribution will be vital to the project's success.Collaboration Details:The collaboration can take one of two forms:Singing the Hook: You bring the melody to life with your vocal performance.Melody Creation: You develop the melody and harmonies, enabling me to perform the hook based on your guide.The focus of our work will be on developing catchy melodies for the hooks of my tracks. I'll handle the lyrics, tailoring them to fit the melodies we devise. My challenge has been in creating melodies that resonate and stick with the audience, and your expertise could be the key to unlocking this potential.Ideal Candidate:You should have a strong background in melody creation, with the ability to adapt across genres such as Soul, R&B, Rap, Afrobeats, and Dancehall. Creativity, versatility, and a collaborative spirit are essential qualities for this role.Next Steps:If you're interested in this collaboration and believe you have the skills to contribute significantly, please reach out with a brief introduction of yourself, your experience with creating melodies, and importantly, include some links to your work so I can have a listen to it. This will give me a better understanding of your style and capabilities.I'm looking forward to finding the right partners to bring these tracks to life. Let's create something memorable together!Budget: $150Posted On: February 14, 2024 10:23 UTCCategory: SingingSkills:Male, Female, Hiphop, Jazz, Soul, Singing, MusicSkills: Male, Female, Hiphop, Jazz, Soul, Singing, MusicCountry: Switzerland""

""Seeking Graphic Designer for Nutrition Flyer CreationDescription:We are 2 dedicated nutritionists seeking a skilled graphic designer to collaborate on a project. Your role will be to create a visually appealing layout that aligns with our brand identity and effectively communicates the message to our audience.Here's what I'm looking for in a graphic designer:Proficiency in Graphic Design: You should have experience and proficiency in graphic design software and tools to create eye-catching designs.Attention to Detail: A keen eye for detail is essential to ensure that the flyer accurately represents our brand and delivers the intended message.Creativity: I value creativity and fresh ideas. ""Brief Description:We are seeking a highly skilled developer or development team to undertake an exciting project designed to enhance our digital marketing analysis capabilities. The project encompasses two primary objectives: the creation of custom connectors for various platforms and the development of a dynamic dashboard in Google's Looker Studio. This dashboard will be updated daily to display public data from a range of sources, providing insightful analytics to inform our marketing strategies.Project Goals and Requirements:The overarching goal is to develop a seamless, automated system that aggregates and visualizes data from multiple platforms in a single Looker Studio dashboard. The specific platforms and the types of data we are interested in are as follows:1. Semrush (via Provided Account)- Utilization of the built-in connector is preferred; however, if not viable, the creation of a custom connector will be necessary.- Data Points: Organic and Paid Traffic Analytics, SEO Ranking Analytics, and Backlinks Analytics.2. Google PageSpeed Insights- Focus on Main Category Scores and the top 3 recommended actions/errors for Core Web Vitals, SEO, Speed, and Best Practices.3. Google My Business- Status (claimed/unclaimed), completeness of data, reviews, and review rating.4. Instagram Historical Public Data (like notjustanalytics.com)- Metrics: Followers, Engagement, Average Comments, Average Likes, Top 3 Performing Posts, Reels Analytics (play rate).5. TikTok Public Data- Metrics: Followers and Engagement.6. LinkedIn & Pinterest- Visual representation showing presence (existing or non-existing).Implementation Options:The successful contractor can choose from two approaches based on efficiency, reliability, and ease of maintenance:- **Option A:** Utilize Google Sheets and Google Apps Script to pull data from the respective APIs into individual Google Sheets for each client and then configure Looker Studio to source data from these sheets.- **Option B:** Directly build custom connectors for each required API to integrate with Looker Studio.Project Deliverables:1. Development and implementation of all required connectors, ensuring accurate and reliable data retrieval.2. Creation of a comprehensive dashboard in Looker Studio that dynamically updates to display the specified metrics from each platform.3. Detailed documentation on the architecture, configuration, and maintenance of the developed system.4. Training sessions (if necessary) to guide our team on utilizing and maximizing the dashboard's potential.Skills and Experience Required:- Proficiency in API integration and development, especially with the specified platforms.- Extensive experience with Google Cloud Platform services, particularly Looker Studio, Google Sheets, and Google Apps Script.- Strong understanding of data visualization and the ability to create insightful, user-friendly dashboards.- Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently or as part of a team.Project Timeline:Please provide an estimated timeline for completion based on your experience with similar projects.Budget:We are open to proposals and encourage you to include your estimated pricing based on the scope described.Application Requirements:Interested candidates are requested to submit the following:- A portfolio showcasing previous work on similar projects.- A brief proposal outlining your approach to the project, including a high-level strategy for both connector development and dashboard creation.- Estimated timeline and budget.We are looking forward to your proposals and are excited to collaborate on this innovative project to enhance our digital marketing insights.Hourly Range: $12.00-$39.00Posted On: February 20, 2024 16:19 UTCCategory: Data AnalyticsSkills:Marketing Analytics, Analytical Presentation, Dashboard, Report, Looker Studio, Data Analysis, Data Visualization, Instagram APISkills: Marketing Analytics, Analytical Presentation, Dashboard, Report, Looker Studio, Data Analysis, Data Visualization, Instagram APICountry: Germany""

""Hi,I am seeking a ChatGPT or just about any LLM specialist to craft AI-generated articles on a list of keywords that I give you. I currently have a list of about 32 keywords that I am trying to target and I need you to use your preferred tool of choice to write a [REDACTED_PHONE] word entry for each of them. You need to instruct your tool of choice to write the articles in a way that mentions the target keyword as much as possible without compromising on the readability of the article.At the beginning and end of the article, it should also mention the company name that provides the service the article is about and link to its site. All in all, it's a very straightforward process, just automating the writing of content marketing articles. I was doing it myself but it's getting too cumbersome submitting several prompts to ChatGPT 4.0 for each article (as it can't write [REDACTED_PHONE] word articles in one-go, you have to break them into separate sections and them combine them afterwards).Please also make sure that the articles aren't written too generically. You want part of your prompt engineering to include the act of instructing it to write in a more human manner that will relate to the readers, otherwise it'll just end up writing the articles in a way that is now easily detectable as AI-generated content by most people.I've found that finding content relevant to the keyword online and copy-and-pasting/feeding it the information from those articles makes it so it doesn't give you the most generic information imaginable. You just tell it to then re-write it in a fashion that sounds more human and it will do a relatively good job of that. Then just have it insert the company in one of the paragraphs in the introduction and conclusion. The introduction needs to be subtle and relevant, I do not want the articles coming off as too "salesy".I am looking to pay $3 per finished article and will have probably another couple hundred keywords that I'll need to target in the near future.
